reviewText:
A "must have" for any Steve McQueen buff.  And, the story line blends in very nicely with the China history of the era depicted in the movie.  Excellent acting by a collection of big name stars contribute to the gripping yarn.
Blue Ray was of excellent quality; some minor prompting needed to thwart initial title section to get to the movie.  Once there, everything was 100% excellent!  5 stars!
